brand.name: Ibrah
brand.tagline: Stories that leave a lesson behind
brand.description: In every story lies a truth. In every truth, a lesson worth learning. Ibrah brings you powerful narratives that touch the heart and awaken the soul.

quranAyat.title: On Patience and Trust
quranAyat.translation: And give good tidings to the patient
quranAyat.shortText: Allah promises glad tidings for those who remain patient during trials.

quranAyat.title: On Gratitude
quranAyat.translation: If you are grateful, I will certainly give you more
quranAyat.shortText: Allah's promise to increase His blessings for the grateful.

quranAyat.title: On Divine Help
quranAyat.arabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا
quranAyat.translation: And whoever fears Allah, He will make for him a way out
quranAyat.shortText: Trust in Allah opens doors where none seem to exist.

hadith.title: The Best of People
hadith.text: The best of people are those who benefit others.
hadith.shortText: True excellence lies in serving humanity with sincerity.

hadith.title: On Kindness
hadith.text: Whoever is not merciful to others will not be treated mercifully.
hadith.shortText: Mercy shown to creation brings mercy from the Creator.

hadith.title: On Character
hadith.text: I was sent to perfect good character.
hadith.shortText: The Prophet's mission centered on elevating human character.

stories.title: The Generous Neighbor
stories.shortText: A poor man's daily act of sharing his meager meal with his neighbor led to unexpected blessings.
stories.lesson: Generosity, no matter how small, creates ripples of goodness.

stories.title: The Honest Merchant
stories.shortText: A trader who always spoke truth about his goods, even when it meant less profit, became the most trusted in the market.
stories.lesson: Honesty is the foundation of lasting success.

stories.title: The Forgiving Heart
stories.shortText: A mother who forgave her son's killer found peace that years of anger couldn't bring.
stories.lesson: Forgiveness heals the forgiver more than the forgiven.
